title.rendered: “US-Israel Defense Alliance: How Joint Military Efforts Thwarted Iranian Attack”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The Chief of Staff spoke with the Commander of the American CENTCOM: The close cooperation between the armies over the course of the war led to the creation of a strong defense coalition that proved itself last night.

The Chief of Staff, Major General Herzl Halevi, spoke this morning (Sunday) with the Commander of US CENTCOM, General Michael Eric Kurilla. The Chief of Staff expressed great appreciation for the joint defense effort to thwart and intercept the Iranian attack on Israel. The Chief of Staff added that the close cooperation between the armies over the course of the war led to the creation of a strong defense coalition that proved itself last night. The Chief of Staff asked General Kurilla to convey his high regard to his men, for their joint and highly professional operation. The strategic partnership between the IDF and the US Army is significant in maintaining regional stability and security in the Middle East.

Subsequently, the Chief of Staff held a situation assessment with the members of the General Staff Forum.

Pictures on the topic attached: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC71404
